import React from 'react' export default function AdminView(props) { // Ensure props.Img is passed correctly, and use it htmlFor the crop function const imagePath = cropImgPath(props.select.image); const [foodName, setFoodName] = useState(props.select.name); // State for the food name const [foodCat, setFoodCat] = useState(props.select.categoryName); const [foodSD, setFoodSD] = useState(props.select.shortDescription); const [foodD, setFoodD] = useState(props.select.description); // Initialize foodIngredients with the correct structure const [foodIngredients, setFoodIngredients] = useState(props.select.ingredients); const [foodImg, setFoodImg] = useState(imagePath) const [outputURL, setOutputURL] = useState(imagePath) return (


setFoodName(e.target.value)}>

handleIngredientChange(index, event)} placeholder="Ingredient Name" />
